ygData.subject: Farewell Shada; safe journey
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Take care Shada.  I know you gave em hell :). Maravana Vireo Deadly Virtues Mithaniel Marr __________________________________________________ Do You
ygData.messageBody:
> No I loved my bard and my guild and the game, I just was playing too long
> (2.5 years now) and saw a very short to no future left for me. I've seen
> and done just about everything there is to do, and wanted to get back to the
> real world. So account cancelled, all characters deleted.
>
> Shada Iceheart [Retired]

Take care Shada. I know you gave 'em hell :).


Maravana Vireo
Deadly Virtues
Mithaniel Marr
